import React from 'react'; import { DateRangePicker } from 'react-dates'; import * as moment from 'moment'; class Constraints extends React.Component { state = { focusedInput: null, }; isOutsideRange = (day) => day.isBefore(moment().subtract(3, 'years')); render() { return (
Constraints
this.props.markdownTypeHandler(true)} checked={this.props.markdownTypeVal}> Hard MD this.props.markdownTypeHandler(false)} checked={!this.props.markdownTypeVal}> POS MD
this.props.constraintsCadenceHandler('overall')} checked={this.props.cadenceConstraintsVal === 'overall'}> Overall this.props.constraintsCadenceHandler('sku')} checked={this.props.cadenceConstraintsVal === 'sku'}> SKU/SKU Group level
); } } export default Constraints;
